title: The Eagle, The Mole and The Shepherd: A New Paradigm for Action
description:
Dave left nihilism to find a life of meaning and now he wakes up every morning looking forward to a new adventure.

Each morning, asking the question:  What can I do for someone today?
What do I get to do today?

Motivational speaker he likes is Les Brown. He inadvertently said Les Stroud.

Attention - getting the eagle's eye view.
Choosing the space between.

Machine Learning's problem with perpetual rejection.

Dave's previous conversation on this channel:  https://youtu.be/6dbaljDJRlo

The movie mentioned is Door to Door:  https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0274468/
